mapper.insert: INSERT ignore tb_bsns_info (info_id, info_logo_a, info_logo_b, info_bsns_name, info_agency, info_bsns_person, info_bsns_depart, info_op_charger, info_bsns_charger, info_bsns_manager, info_bsns_period) VALUES (1, null, null, null, null, null, null, null, null, null, null)
mapper.select: select USER_ID as userId , USER_NM as userName , PSITN as position , CLSF as clsf from TB_LOGIN_INFO where USER_TY_CODE = #{userTyCode} and USER_STTUS_CODE = 'U002'

select info_logo_a as infoLogoA , info_logo_b as infoLogoB , info_bsns_name as infoBsnsName , info_agency as infoAgency , info_bsns_person as infoBsnsPerson , info_bsns_depart as infoBsnsDepart , info_op_charger as infoOpCharger , info_bsns_charger as infoBsnsCharger , info_bsns_manager as infoBsnsManager , info_bsns_period as infoBsnsPeriod from TB_BSNS_INFO where info_id = 1
